title: Waldo Box
desc:
Post 109
- Next round you fire heals <:charge:1240849067362488403>s instead of dealing damage. If the round heals <:charge:1240849067362488403>s already, it instead deals damage.
- **Have a Nice Death**
 - Gain a random **Have a Nice Death** item upon use UNLESS below condition applies AND you got this item from this attribute.
 - Lose a random item next time you lose a <:charge:1240849067362488403> if you've already used 2+ **Have a Nice Death** items this game.
_ _
